N = int(input())
S,T = input().split()

for i in range(N):
    print(S[i] + T[i], end="")

n = int(input())
s, t = input().split()

for i in range(n):
    print(s[i], end="")
    print(t[i], end="")

N = int(input())
S, T = input().split()

result = ''
for i in range(N):
    result += S[i] + T[i]
print(result)

N = int(input())
S, T = input().split()

print("".join([S[i]+T[i] for i in range(N)]))
